title: @Riot Kateykhaos PROJECT Yasuo q indicator bug
body:
AS the title states, high noon, blood moon and classic yasuo use a semi transparent thin line as a range indicator for when q has the third strike ready, from the original thick light blue line. However, PROJECT yasuo still uses the thick blue line.
Repro steps: 1. go into game as  high noon, blood moon or classic yasuo and charge q to third stack, observe range indicator.
2. do the same for Project yasuo, but see how range indicator is different from his other skins.

I know yasuo used to have the thick indicator before it was changed, so it is probably an oversight that you missed project yasuo.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here.

In the future, no need to tag me in the title, I scan the boards pretty frequently. ^-^
